project.title: Parallel Explorer
project.description: Parallel Explorer is a grid-based viewer that lets users load and explore multiple web resources simultaneously. Each URL opens in its own panel, allowing synchronized scrolling, multi-panel comparisons, and real-time research workflows. Designed for OSINT, research, monitoring, and productivity use cases.
project.blurb: Multi-panel URL explorer: tile, sync, and inspect multiple websites side-by-side in a grid view.
